author: KirkMarple
content:
Went back to using Claude Code again, and finding it really clunky. 

(Spent a ton on @FactoryAI Droid tokens this month, and needed to use up some of our Anthropic credits.)

But it really shows the work that Droid put in on the TUI and overall “TX”. 

Finding that CC locks itself up more often, and overall feels slower - even tho I’m using an identical Sonnet 4.5 with medium thinking.

May go back to a custom model with Droid and see how that works again.

classification.label: love
classification.reason: Detailed positive comparison praising Factory Droid over Claude Code, highlighting superior UX

author: Tmeister
content:
I tried Gemini 3.0 on a Droid by @FactoryAI. I'm not sure if it's an Agent or Model issue.

In a plan mode, I write, "let's plan the feature and show me your plan to ... and do not make any changes yet."

The first thing it does is try to start editing files, no asking, no feedback, jumps directly to code.

classification.label: bug
classification.reason: User reports an issue with Droid taking unwanted actions despite instructions to plan only
